answer_en: If you have no safe place to stay tonight, treat this as urgent. You can contact a Social Service Office (SSO) / ComCare for support, or visit the nearest Family Service Centre (FSC). If there is immediate danger or you feel unsafe, call 999.
answer_zh: 如果你今晚没有安全的住处，请优先按“紧急情况”处理。你可以联系社会服务办公室（SSO）/ ComCare 寻求援助，或前往附近的家庭服务中心（FSC）。如有人身危险或感到不安全，请拨打 999。

answer_en: If you are in immediate danger, call 999. If you can, move to a safe place and seek help from appropriate services (e.g., FSC / SSO). You do not need to handle this alone.
answer_zh: 如果你正处于紧急危险，请立即拨打 999。如果可以，请先去安全地点，并联系相关服务机构（如 FSC / SSO）寻求支持。你不需要独自承担。

answer_en: For medical cost support, common routes include subsidies at public healthcare institutions, MediSave/MediShield Life (if eligible), and financial assistance via hospital medical social workers. If you tell me whether it’s outpatient, hospitalization, or long-term care, I can point you to the most relevant options.
answer_zh: 医疗费用支持通常包括公立医疗机构补贴、MediSave/MediShield Life（符合条件时）、以及通过医院医务社工申请的援助。如果你说明是门诊、住院还是长期护理需求，我可以更精确地指向相关选项。

answer_en: If you recently lost income or need financial support, start with ComCare / Social Service Offices (SSO). They can assess your situation and guide you to suitable assistance. If the case is urgent (no food, no shelter), seek immediate support and consider escalating to a human caseworker.
answer_zh: 如果你近期失去收入或需要经济支持，可以优先从 ComCare / 社会服务办公室（SSO）开始。他们会了解情况并引导到合适的援助项目。如果情况紧急（没食物/没住处），建议立即寻求支持并转人工跟进。

keywords: 附近 社会服务办公室
附近 家庭服务中心

answer_en: To find the nearest help centre, use SupportGoWhere and search by your postal code or area. If you share your general area (no need for full address), I can suggest which category to search for.
answer_zh: 要找最近的求助点，可以在 SupportGoWhere 用邮编或区域搜索。如果你告诉我大概区域（不需要完整地址），我也可以建议用什么关键词/类别去搜。
